text: Abdur Rouf Chowdhury is a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament of Kushtia-2. ==Career== Chowdhury was elected to parliament from Kushtia-2 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. He was elected in 1991 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate from Kushtia-3. His son, barrister Raghib Rauf Chowdhury, is the Office Secretary of the Lawyers unit of Bangladesh Nationalist Party. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:Living people Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Abdur Rouf Chowdhury
